page.title: 15Newbold Avon Middle
page.content: Newbold Avon is a{middle}school with nearly 200 pupils aged beetween 8 and 12 years.It became a middle school in 1970 following{reorganisation. There are 8{classrooms}in the main building with a large hall and dining room.A{unit}is situated near to the school with facilities for craft and science. Newbold Grange secondary school is on the same site and most of the pupils{ {transfer}to this school when they are 12.Other schools which children leave for are Harris, Ashlawn, Rugby High school and Lawrence Sheriff. The school has a very good{tradition} in cross country running, and the{ {choir}are building up an excellent reputation.Unfortunately the number of children in the school is decreasing because of the falling birth rate in the village.
